Pathfinder Worker:
Rim Kamaloka - it was an invasion of Darkness through dreams. If we do not close them, then people fallen asleep, will die.
To close them, we need a dream to fight with the enemy. If you are brave enough, try to get on the battlefield.
Challenge Rim Kamaloka.
Ask about how to counter.
Make a contribution in the form Essence of Kamaloka.
Check the list of the best achievements.
